name: Astrosurge
description:
Astrosurge! For the ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Arcade Controls Jam

Defeat waves of enemies, upgrade your ship per level, and collect enemy swarms for yourself for building cover, launch homing attacks or flak/shell explosions. 

How to play:

  • Move left and right with arrow keys
  • Hold shift to shoot
  • Up and down arrow keys to navigate the shop
  • Press shift to purchase selected item
  • In the game over screen: up and down arrows to select a letter, shift to confirm selection

Upgrades:

  • FIRERATE + : Your gun/s will fire faster
  • GUNS + : Add another gun to your ship, firing two or three bullets at a time. Max of 3
  • CHOICES + : More things to pick from next time a shop opens
  • MISSILES + : Shoot missiles that explode, further upgrades increase fire rate
  • DRONES + : A tiny ship follows you around and shoots when you do, but slower
  • SWARM COUNT + : Increase max size of your swarm
  • SWARM: BULLETS + : Swarm turns into bullets when they get destroyed dye to swarm limit
  • SWARM: WALLS + : Swarm has a chance to build a barricade, blocking enemy fire. Further upgrades increase wall durability
  • SWARM: HOMING + : Swarm has a chance to turn into homing missiles that target the largest threat. Further upgrades increase damage
  • SWARM: FLAK SHOTS + : Swarm has a chance to turn into bullets that explode into more bullets. Further upgrades increase split amount
  • SWARM DROPS + : Enemies have a chance to drop two swarms instead of one, further upgrades increase this to 2 then 3.

Once you complete all the levels, the game will loop with lower level enemies swapped out for higher level ones, and enemies will be far more aggressive.
